name: David Letterman
monologue: During tourist season in New York City, the limit is that you can only kill two tourists.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Experts say New York’s new gay marriage bill could bring $210 million into the state’s economy. Even more surprising: All of that would be from one crazy bachelor party.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Anthony Weiner is reportedly involved in choosing his successor. The first question he asked his potential replacements is, “What’s the difference between ‘reply’ and ‘reply all?’”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A senior al-Qaida leader was arrested in Afghanistan and he was disguised as a woman. Police became suspicious after he was seen stoning himself.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Michele Bachmann is kind of like Sarah Palin but without the charisma — or marksmanship.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Bachmann didn’t know John Wayne Gacy was from her hometown of Waterloo, Iowa. The town is about the size of the Wayans family.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The next-most famous person from that town is the guy that grew the biggest pumpkin at the town fair.
